MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G53 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:46pm. Our engineers have arrived at the Glen Esk Drive substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:00pm on Sunday, 01 November 2020
